title: Volinette's Song: A Magic of Solendrea Novel
description: A pulse-pounding standalone adventure in the Magic of Solendrea series...Volinette Terris has everything most girls could a famous family, plenty of money, and a career as a talented musician. No one would expect her to risk losing it all to try and become a Quintessentialist, but when the School of Sorcery opens for the Trial of Admission, that’s exactly what she does.If only she’d known that winning a place in the Academy of Arcane Arts and Sciences would be the least of her problems. Now she finds herself accused of murder, tormented by her fellow students, and implicated in the theft of a mystical artifact that could bring about the end of the world.And that’s just the first semester!
author: Martin Hengst
